actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for an additional national cemetery at Woodbridge, Va.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Veterans' Administration to ascertain the availability of the former United States Army radio transmitter site at Woodbridge, Virginia, for the establishment of an additional national cemetery, to prepare preliminary plans and cost estimates for such an acquisition, and to report the results to Congress not later than September 1, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an additional national cemetery at Woodbridge, Va.
